scripts.dev-server: docker run --rm -v $PWD:/app -p 8080:8080 -e ASSET_PATH="http://$(docker-machine ip):8080/" hut6/webpack webpack-dev-server --mode development
scripts.watch: fswatch -e index.js -o ./src/ | xargs -n1 -I{} docker exec $(basename $PWD) touch /app/src/index.js & P1=$$ ; docker run --name=$(basename $PWD) --rm -v $PWD:/app hut6/webpack webpack --mode development --watch ; pkill -P $P1
